name: Railroad Rogues
description:
Railroad Rouges was made during 3 days during TOJAM 2016. It's a four-player brawler where each player must collect the most gold before the time runs out. It is also possible to play single player and just attack enemies to collect gold as well.

It's not quite finished, but we hope you might enjoy trying it out!

The keyboard controls are:
Arrow Keys - Move
Z - Jump
X - Attack / Grab
C - Drop

The game should also work with most standard controllers.

Made by Team Snail Whale:
Adam R. Alex B. Dawn B. Kat N.
